1.name: Dracula
1.description: The ancient vampire Count Dracula arrives in England and begins to prey upon the virtuous young Mina.

2.name: Frankenstein
2.description: An obsessed scientist assembles a living being from parts of exhumed corpses.

3.name: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
3.description: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

4.name: City Lights
4.description: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

5.name: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
5.description: Dr. Jekyll faces horrible consequences when he lets his dark side run wild with a potion that transforms him into the animalistic Mr. Hyde.

6.name: Chances
6.description: Two brothers on leave fall for the same girl in World War I London.

7.name: The Public Enemy
7.description: A young hoodlum rises up through the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a bloody mob war.

8.name: Drácula
8.description: Centuries-old vampire Dracula preys upon the innocent Eva and her friends.

9.name: Little Caesar
9.description: A small-time criminal moves to a big city to seek bigger fortune.

10.name: Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
10.description: On the South Pacific island of Bora Bora, a young couple's love is threatened when the tribal chief declares the girl a sacred virgin.

11.name: Strictly Dishonorable
11.description: A womanizing singer falls for an old-fashioned Southern belle. The problem is, she already has a fiance.

12.name: Monkey Business
12.description: On a transatlantic crossing, The Marx Brothers get up to their usual antics and manage to annoy just about everyone on board the ship.

13.name: Mata Hari
13.description: A semi-fictionalized account of the life of Mata Hari, an exotic dancer who was accused of spying for Germany during World War I.

14.name: Svengali
14.description: Through hypnotism and telepathic mind control, a sinister music maestro controls the singing voice, but not the heart, of the woman he loves.

15.name: Cimarron
15.description: A newspaper editor settles in an Oklahoma boom town with his reluctant wife at the end of the nineteenth century.

16.name: The Front Page
16.description: An investigative reporter sees an opportunity for the story of a lifetime when an accused murderer escapes hanging.

17.name: The Maltese Falcon
17.description: A lovely dame with dangerous lies employs the services of a private detective, who is quickly caught up in the mystery and intrigue of a statuette known as the Maltese Falcon.

18.name: Waterloo Bridge
18.description: A prostitute's self-loathing makes her reluctant to marry an idealistic soldier during World War One.

19.name: Night Nurse
19.description: A nurse enlists the help of a petty criminal to foil a sinister plot to murder two children.

20.name: The Champ
20.description: An alcoholic ex-boxer struggles to provide a good living for his son.

21.name: Five Star Final
21.description: The City Editor of a sleazy tabloid goes against his own journalistic ethics to resurrect a twenty year old murder case... with tragic results.

22.name: The Miracle Woman
22.description: After an unappreciated minister dies, his daughter loses her faith in God, prompting her to open a phony temple with a con man. Can the love of a blind aviator restore her faith and happiness?

23.name: Under Eighteen
23.description: A poor seamstress girl sours on her engagement to a grocery deliveryman after seeing her sister's abusive marriage. Trying to help her sister pay for a divorce lawyer, she turns to a rich playboy she met at work.

24.name: Dishonored
24.description: The Austrian Secret Service sends its most seductive agent to spy on the Russians.

25.name: Blonde Crazy
25.description: The adventures of an egoistic con man and his glamorous accomplice.

26.name: Pardon Us
26.description: Two guys end up in prison after attempting to sell beer to a policeman during Prohibition.

27.name: Seed
27.description: Bart is a clerk for a publishing company. He has written a novel. His wife Peggy and he have five children. Bart's former girlfriend, Mildred, is manager of the company's Paris office. She ...                See full summary »

28.name: Illicit
28.description: A young couple lives together out of wedlock, but they find that they're ahead of their time.

29.name: The Black Camel
29.description: The unsolved murder of a Hollywood actor several years earlier and an enigmatic psychic are the keys to help Charlie solve the Honolulu stabbing death of a beautiful actress.

30.name: Susan Lenox (Her Fall and Rise)
30.description: Fleeing her cruel uncle and an arranged marriage Susan Lenox falls in love with a kind stranger but circumstances force her to become a woman of easy virtue.

31.name: Platinum Blonde
31.description: A young woman from a very rich family impulsively marries a reporter, but each assumes the other is the one whose lifestyle must change.

32.name: Safe in Hell
32.description: After accidentally killing the man who raped her and forced her into prostitution, a New Orleans woman flees to a Caribbean island. While she awaits her fiancé, the vicious local police chief sets his sights on her.

33.name: La chienne
33.description: A woman and her pimp exploit a painter for money.

34.name: An American Tragedy
34.description: A poor factory worker, employed by a wealthy uncle, falls in love with a beautiful heiress but his happiness and promising future are jeopardized by a previous affair with a coworker he impregnated.

35.name: Street Scene
35.description: Twenty-four hours elapse on the stoop of a Hell's Kitchen tenement as a microcosm of the American melting pot interacts with each other during a summer heatwave.

36.name: Possessed
36.description: An ambitious factory girl meets a handsome, wealthy lawyer, but he's interested in her as a mistress, not a wife.

37.name: Millie
37.description: Millie's life begins to crumble when she finds out her husband is having an affair.

38.name: À nous la liberté
38.description: Seeking better life, two convicts escape from prison.

39.name: The Skin Game
39.description: An old traditional family and a modern family battle over land in a small English village and almost destroy each other.

40.name: Arrowsmith
40.description: A medical researcher is sent to a plague outbreak, where he has to decide priorities for the use of a vaccine.

41.name: Inspiration
41.description: Yvonne is a beautiful model who loves frequenting the Parisian bohemian life, because she loves hobnobbing with artists.

42.name: Bad Girl
42.description: A man and woman, skeptical about romance, nonetheless fall in love and are wed, but their lack of confidence in the opposite sex haunts their marriage.

43.name: Smart Money
43.description: Immigrant Greek barber has uncommon skills in playing poker and soon rises in the seedy world of illegal gambling, but pretty blondes remain his Achilles' heel.

44.name: Rich and Strange
44.description: Believing that an unexpected inheritance will bring them happiness, a married couple instead finds their relationship strained to the breaking point.

45.name: Die 3 Groschen-Oper
45.description: In London at the turn of the century, the bandit Mack the Knife marries Polly without the knowledge of her father, Peachum, the 'king of the beggars'.

46.name: Trader Horn
46.description: Two white traders in the darkest Africa of the 1870s find a missionary's daughter, who was captured as a child by a savage tribe and now worshiped as a goddess.

47.name: Limite
47.description: Three people sail aimlessly while remembering their past.

48.name: Iron Man
48.description: Prizefighter Mason loses his opening fight so wife Rose leaves him for Hollywood. Without her around Mason trains and starts winning. Rose comes back and wants Mason to dump his manager Regan and replace him with her secret lover Lewis.

49.name: City Streets
49.description: Man joins a gang to free his girlfriend from prison.

50.name: The Bad Sister
50.description: Marianne falls in love with a con artist who has a hidden agenda.
